Profile.bio: My name is Neilton Seguins, non-practicing otaku, developer, gamer and bassist.

AboutPage.title: Hi there! I'm {name}, nice to meet you!
AboutPage.description_1: I'm from São Luís, MA, Brazil. I hold a degree in Science and Technology and Mechanical Engineering from UFMA. In 2021, I decided to switch careers and started my journey in programming, combining my technical curiosity with a passion for learning.
AboutPage.description_2: I worked as an instructor for 3 years, and today I am a software developer at Alura, working with technologies like JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Next.js, React Native, and Node.js. I have experience in developing front-end and back-end applications, and I also enjoy software testing. Currently, I am pursuing a Postgraduate degree in FullStack Development at Fiap.
AboutPage.description_3: When I'm not coding, I like listening to music, playing video games, watching anime, movies, series, or playing my bass. After all, creativity in code is also fueled outside of it!

ProjectsPage.heading: Whenever I can, I create or participate in open source projects
ProjectsPage.subheading: From collaborating on open repositories to creating my own projects, I enjoy contributing to the developer community.

ArticlesPage.heading: I like to write, so I usually have something to share
ArticlesPage.subheading: I like to bring ideas and thoughts straight from my notes and studies

CoursesPage.heading: As an instructor, I have recorded several courses at Alura
CoursesPage.subheading: Mainly about React, I have contributed to several courses, such as ContextAPI, testing, form validation, and much more.
